name: ComparatorUtilsTest
description: Unit tests for the ComparatorUtils class, which provides utility methods for comparators.

test_cases.name: testBooleanComparator
test_cases.description: Tests the booleanComparator method of ComparatorUtils, ensuring it correctly compares Boolean values based on the provided boolean parameter.

test_cases.name: testChainedComparator
test_cases.description: Tests the chainedComparator method of ComparatorUtils, ensuring it correctly chains two natural comparators for Integer values.

test_cases.name: testMax
test_cases.description: Tests the max method of ComparatorUtils, ensuring it correctly returns the maximum value based on the provided comparator.

test_cases.name: testMin
test_cases.description: Tests the min method of ComparatorUtils, ensuring it correctly returns the minimum value based on the provided comparator.

test_cases.name: testNullHighComparator
test_cases.description: Tests the nullHighComparator method of ComparatorUtils, ensuring it correctly handles null values as higher than non-null values.

test_cases.name: testNullLowComparator
test_cases.description: Tests the nullLowComparator method of ComparatorUtils, ensuring it correctly handles null values as lower than non-null values.
